txt.en: This Ent has let his roots grow long in a beautiful meadow out of the shadow of the Black Heart, but his eyes show that he is deeply worried about something.\n\nYou should speak with the Ent, and see if he has any memories to impart upon you so that you may be of some assistance.

Oldheart is evidently quite sentimental about his bird-friend who nested with him this year. He has not seen the little bird for some days, and he has grown worried, for the bird was hard at work building a nest.
You have the sensation of recalling a memory that is not your own....
You have come upon a distraught-looking Ent named Oldheart, looking around him with worry weighing heavy upon him.
The Ent Oldheart is at the head of a clearing south of the Black Heart.\n\nYou should speak with Oldheart and observe his memories.
The Ent Oldheart is at the head of a clearing south of the Black Heart.\n\nYou should speak with Oldheart once more.
